class.name: wxChoicebook
class.description: wxChoicebook is a class similar to wxNotebook, but uses a wxChoice control to show the labels instead of the tabs.

flag.name: wxCHB_DEFAULT
flag.description: Choose the default location for the labels depending on the current platform (left everywhere except Mac where it is top).

flag.name: wxCHB_TOP
flag.description: Place labels above the page area.

flag.name: wxCHB_LEFT
flag.description: Place labels on the left side.

flag.name: wxCHB_RIGHT
flag.description: Place labels on the right side.

flag.name: wxCHB_BOTTOM
flag.description: Place labels below the page area.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
type.description: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
type.description: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed (using wxNotifyEvent::Veto()).

bitmap.label: Bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap shown alongside the label (default: none).

int.name: image
int.label: Image index
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item into the image list.

bool.name: selected
bool.label: Selected
bool.description: Is the page selected initially (only one page can be selected; default: 0)?
